RainbruRPG::Core::ObjectPos

RainbruRPG::Core::ObjectPos Class Reference

#include <objectpos.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Core::ObjectPos:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

An object defining the position of a mesh.

An ObjectMesh can appears more than one times. The position, rotation and name of all its instance are this class.
